title: Cannot Log In
body:
I has been unable to log in into League since yesterday. It kept saying that "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com". And none of the solutions mentioned in the connection issues guide work. I even tried the Legacy Client but still didn't work :| 
 
I noticed there are other players who are experiencing the same issue as me, so Riot please fix it quickly!

Thanks.

replies.body: Hey guys, are you still having an issue logging in? Is this happening on both the updated and legacy client?
I am now having this problem on both legacy and updated client. Was a fix ever found??

> [{quoted}](name=cCc Grumbles cCc,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=40AtbjOm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-14T20:53:58.837+0000)
>
> Hey guys, are you still having an issue logging in? Is this happening on both the updated and legacy client?

Yes and it is 3 months later lol

This also just started happening to me today as well.
New and old client. both dont work.

I started having this issue today as well. It was working fine last night, but as of today, I'm experiencing this error. Server status says it's fine, so I don't know what is going on. I'm on the new client btw.
I'm in the same boat. I was playing fine earlier today, then when I got home from some errands I can not log in anymore.
yes, I'm using Mac and this happened yesterday [image](http://i.imgur.com/z4Ve5OC.png)
I'm having this issue now as well - would love some update as I can't log on at all.
Im am also having this issue. I unistalled all of LOL and reinstalled did a force patch via the lOL log in. and installed the hextex and both did not work
I am also having this problem as of now. Haven't figured anything out. I have re-installed and everything.
